prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with a crystal-like body and sharp features.
I want a Pokemon that looks like a giant snowball with icy spikes.
Generate a glacial creature that embodies the spirit of winter in its design.
Make a Pokemon that resembles a snowy mountain with a fierce expression.
Imagine a frigid Pokemon with a round body and jagged ice protrusions.
Design an elegant ice-type Pokemon with a mix of blue and gray hues.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a blizzard with sharp edges.
